## Checklist — Public Safety
- [ ] No proprietary protocol internals included
- [ ] No confidential/legal-sensitive content
- [ ] No credentials/endpoints/secrets/logs
- [ ] No code or docs copied from private repos
- [ ] Scoped, concise, and aligned with PUBLIC_REPO_POLICY.md
